snippet: Michelle Lopez, who tested positive for H.I.V. in 1991, takes to the streets in Brooklyn to try and convince passers-by to take a rapid H.I.V. test.
abstract: Michelle Lopez, who tested positive for H.I.V. in 1991, takes to the streets in Brooklyn to try and convince passers-by to take a rapid H.I.V. test.

headline.main: After H.I.V. Diagnosis, a Life Devoted to Outreach
